channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7681] qualified tablenames usage does not work with several alter-table commands
item.description:
Changes were made in HIVE-4064 for use of qualified table names in more types of queries. But several alter table commands don't work with qualified

  • alter table default.tmpfoo set tblproperties ("bar" = "bar value")
  • ALTER TABLE default.kv_rename_test CHANGE a a STRING
  • add,drop partition
  • alter index rebuild
item.summary: qualified tablenames usage does not work with several alter-table commands

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Left-factoring is really quit a easy way to remove left recursion, learned !

ATTACHMENT ID: 12664183
Hi, this patch created a small regression, I've opened HIVE-8212 to track its fix.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
